summary: The Coast Guard carries out varied duties, including Arctic patrols, cybersecurity, and trying to stop illegal fishing in the Western Hemisphere. Its training command delivered more than 400 unique training courses to more than 23,000 Coast Guard students in FY 2023. We found the Coast Guard for the most part followed sound practices when developing, implementing, and evaluating its training. However, it could improve how...
title: Coast Guard: Additional Actions Needed to Guide Training and Assessment Efforts
